alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Alamosa, northwestern Costilla and northeastern Conejos Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 341 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Alamosa East, or 8 miles east of Alamosa, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Alamosa, northwestern Costilla and northeastern Conejos Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley
